snippet.title: FLAK (Funsoft/US Gold) for Commodore 64 gameplay/longplay complete
snippet.description:
Well this game is like 8Kb really, because it is just one 5 minute scrolling landscape with terrible game design (yeah getting shot at from invisible turrets) and looks like result of a drunk mans attempt to replicate something like Xevious. Anyway the video shows the whole thing.....it then just loops the landscape round and that's it :o) Phew! Never have to play it ever again now I have it up on youtube for record (no video of it existed before).

I even bought this game at the time in the 80s....poor me lol

Avoid!! Terrible! It's the kind of rubbish Atari users had to suffer for ages lol
